thread.title: Old Head golf: final results with Sam Torrance
thread.title_full: Old Head golf: final results with Sam Torrance - Telegraph

author: Sam Torrance
title: Old Head golf: final results with Sam Torrance
text: It has been a fantastic couple of days at Old Head Golf Links. All 16 finalists are winners in being able to play a golf course like this, and with everything else Old Mutual Wealth has brought to the event. One American golfer wrote in the visitors’ book that Old Head is like “Pebble Beach on steroids”. He’s right. It is an extraordinary golf course, with sea views on every hole. You could not find a better stage for this competition. Events like this are great for the game, proven by the fact that 25,000 golfers participated. The 16 finalists have all enjoyed being treated as if they are playing on tour, thanks to the quality of the course, hospitality and caddies. The caddies even wore bibs with the golfers’ names on. I enjoyed meeting the finalists and sharing a few stories about the Ryder Cup. There were some good scores in the final and some high numbers, too, on some holes – but that’s golf. I know one thing: I will never forget the first time I set eyes on Old Head. FINAL POSITIONS Men 1st Geoff Lewis, Lilleshall Hall Score 75; Handicap 13 2nd Brian Porteous, Bearsden Score 77; Handicap 6 3rd Daniel Boyle, West Herts Score 80; Handicap 6 4th= Alexander Green, Balbirnie Park Score 81; Handicap 17 4th= Harvey Hancock, Ross-on-Wye Score 81; Handicap 4 6th Tom Shaw, West Hove Score 84; Handicap 7 7th= Graham Poole, Grimsby Score 85; Handicap 6 7th= Steve Kay, Dereham Score 85 Handicap 17 Women 1st Brenda Oxford, The Kendleshire Score 79; Handicap 19 2nd Kate Dunham, Clandon Regis Score 79; Handicap 11 3rd Jill Wallace, Thornton Score 81; Handicap 19 4th= Rebecca Tilke, Woodbury Park Score 83; Handicap 9 4th= Alexandra Ord, Boughton Score 83; Handicap 8 6th Gill Mellor, Prestbury Score 86; Handicap 2 7th Diane Bell, Portal Score 89; Handicap 15 8th Elizabeth Goodwin, Glenbervie Score 90; Handicap 10 • Discover more about the Old Mutual Wealth Golf Challenge »
